title: Server IP / Hostname
desc: The ip address or hostname of the server you would like to connect to

title: Server Port
desc: The port to connect to the server on

title: BTER
desc: Add users for BTER - The number indicates the number of valid users

title: Bitcoin Indonesia
desc: Add users for Bitcoin Indonesia - The number indicates the number of valid users

title: CCEDK
desc: Add users for CCEDK - The number indicates the number of valid users

title: Poloniex
desc: Add users for Poloniex - The number indicates the number of valid users

title: Choose Language
desc:
Set the language file to use
(Doesn't affect this settings menu)

title: Check Period
desc:
The number of seconds between data requests from the server
(doesn't affect the client)

title: Monitor
desc: Use Plunge to monitor your pool account instead of running the client.

title: Start Minimised
desc: Choose whether to start Plunge in the minimised view

title: Data to Display
desc: How many data points to display on the charts (0 shows all data)
